name: Insurance Technologies
overview: Insurance Technologies, LLC provides point-of-sale illustration software solutions for insurance and financial services industries. It offers ForeSight, an illustration software that manages various point-of-sale activities for life, critical illness, disability income, and long-term care insurance carriers, as well as for annuities businesses. The company also provides VisibleChoice, a multi-carrier annuity sales platform for insurance distributors that is used to compare and illustrate multiple products. In addition, it offers consulting, software implementation and hosting, and technical support services. The company offers its products and services to insurance carriers, insurance agents and brokers, financial planners, and investment advisors in the United States and internationally. Insurance Technologies, LLC has strategic partnerships with Blue Frog Solutions; Ebix; and VERTEX, Incorporated. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
